Judo Girl: So You Wanna Revolution #2 (of 4)
Publisher:  Bluewater
Publication Date:  May 11, 2011

Writer:  Chad Rebmann
Penciler:  Dex Paulsen and Gregg Paulsen

Cover Artists:  Gregg Paulsen and Nex

In part 2 of her all mini series, Judo Girl makes her dramatic re appearance on the super hero scene. Which garners the attention of The Revolution, now headed by Steel, the son of her long ago arch nemesis! Unaware that Judo Girl is now a mole for the government, Steel makes a Faustian deal with her to join his anarchist group. The deal is sweetened by having her former allies Polar and Wonderboy on the group, along with a free spirited old school vibe. This jives with Judo GirlÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 60Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s sensibilities and she finds strangely drawn to the groups beliefs, especially with the cynical state of modern day super heroes. Will Judo Girl stay loyal to Agent Riley and the government, especially when Steel offers the location of her missing brother, Judo Boy? Find out as the past and future collide with Judo Girl!
